name: Trazzle
description:
Team Name
HeadsAndBrains

Gameplay InstructionsTransform the object by drag-dropping nodes into horizontal bar bottom and editing axis values to match it with the goal state (object with cyan color).
Each node can only use one axis (X, Y or Z) and has a different grid snap values:
Offset: 1.0,
Rotation: 5.0,
Scale: 0.5.

Controls
WASD to rotate the view,
Mouse Wheel to Zoom in/out,
Space Bar to hide the object.

Help button (cheating)
If you get stuck, you can use the button on top right corner to add correct axis values but you'll need to find the correct order of nodes. After pressing the button don't forget to click on each modified axis and press enter so it gets applied.

Note
Slider is broken in this version of engine (UE-44960 please fix this already :( ), so please use keyboard number keys for entering values instead of sliding with mouse (we made a workaround which is why slider is so janky but kind of works).
